snippet.title: CATACLYSM: Even Angels Sin - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1995530/CATACLYSM_Even_Angels_Sin/

"Taste the Heat"
Composed and performed by Sierra9816
Produced by Sierra9816 and Dre 13
Lyrics and additions by Team Myster

MasGar_VA: @MasGar_VA - Voice of Armageddon
Jameshrooms: @Jameshrooms01 - Voice of the One God - "⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ This is so waweaomwe."
Novashrooms: @novashrooms3863 - Main artist

MAN ABANDONED GOD
SO GOD ABANDONED MAN
AND ANOTHER TOOK HIS PLACE

Inspired by the works of Dante Alighieri and John Milton, the Throne of Heaven is controlled by the deities mankind worship. Throughout history, dozens, if not hundred of deities ruled over the mortal and divine realms. As time passed, this number continued to dwindle, until only one remained, and eventually... None. The Throne remained vacant, aligning the stars perfectly for a malicious beast to steal its power, creating their own Angels and slaughtering all other entities in Heaven, transforming the one Paradise left into a twisted realm of chaos. As what little remaining gods fled, one dared stand.

The Heaven Breaker, whose bullet will rapture Heaven and reclaim Paradise.

- Play as Mictian, the Aztec god of death, and take back the realm of Heaven.
- Fight through swarms of false Angels while staying mobile to avoid a 3D bullet heaven of attacks.
- Build your arsenal and create the perfect loadout.
- Equippable passive abilities allow for fully customizable gameplay.

FOREVER LOST, WE CHANT HIS NAME,
BUT TO HIM, OUR REMARKS ARE JUST THE SAME.
HE SHALL BE OUR SALVATION,
FOR HE HAS MADE A REVELATION.
HE WILL BREACH THE SINNER'S PARADISE,
AND ONCE MORE RECLAIM THE NAME OF CHRIST.
HE WILL SAVE US FROM THEIR CATECHISM,
FOR HE SHALL BE THEIR CATACLYSM.

WE CALL TO YOU, O HEAVEN BREAKER.
WE CALL TO YOU, LORD MICTIAN.
